cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: Distant/remote/undulating/sprinkling(?) ... at nighttime(!?) ... does not give to man/anyone
... is of one having raised his throat(!?) ...
... sleeping ... my kidneys/testicles(?) ... hurt
... with distress, my life has ended
... enters old age
... its dwelling
..., I am/you are ... (and) I am/you are not(?) ...
... like a churn/henbane(?) ...
... after ... my foot(?) ...
... my ..., the wind ... my field(?)
... moaned like a dove ... does not see(?) ...
... my thirst and hunger thinned (me) out(?)
... (my?) nails ... my flesh
... my(!?) neck? set to the ground, my heart emptied (itself) with lamentations
... my eye/face is bound to a cloud of death(?)
... thus, thus was done(?)
... “diminish the tears of my heart”, (but?) my life and heart are not present
... my ... established in a dream(!?), which will not be confused (i.e., misunderstood?) by the dream interpreter
My ..., I end(?)) my life with distress, pain changed my face(?)
... may my king pacify the heart (of) Tišpak
And therefore I(?) ... shall eat ... on her behalf(?) you restore your(i.e., my?) thickness
